name: Kokorogawari
description: Kokorogawari (Change of Heart) is a GxB otome human drama visual novel set in a grounded and authentic portrayal of modern-day Japan. While the two main themes are about love and the arts, Kokorogawari also explores the complexity and depth of familial relationships and emotions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 573 MB available space
